pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mandallaz' Model-Assisted Small Area Estimators // An S4 implementation of the unbiased extension of the model- assisted synthetic-regression estimator proposed by Mandallaz (2013) DOI:10.1139/cjfr-2012-0381, Mandallaz et al. (2013) DOI:10.1139/cjfr-2013-0181 and Mandallaz (2014) DOI:10.1139/cjfr-2013-0449. It yields smaller variances than the standard bias correction, the generalised regression estimator.
